response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for us. Given its significance and the benefits it offers to those who possess it, we believe it would be a perfect fit for someone like yourself. We are extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this product at a special price of $800,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional items. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how this product could enrich your life or business.", "product_price": 800000}
